src_text: ngezenzo zabo, bakha iphasi elinobulungiswa, elilinganako, elinzinzileko nelinokuthula.
tgt_text: vhaswa vha sa ndi vhubvo ha ṱhuṱhuwedzo na fulufhelo vukuzenzele unnamed maipfi a uri ‘murafho muṅwe na muṅwe u fanela u tumbula mishini wawo’ a ḓa muhumbuloni tshifhinga tshoṱhe ndi tshi wana tshikhala tsha u amba na vhaswa vha afrika tshipembe.

src_text: umma onehlanganisela yamalwele angelaphekiko wehlule ingogwana yecovid19 silusapho nyanda uinsaaf mohammed uyelelisa amasewula afrika, khulukhulu lawo anehlanganisela yamalwele angelaphekiko bona bakhathalele ubujamo bepilwabo.
tgt_text: mme vha na malwadze a sa fholi vho kunda covid19 silusapho nyanda vho insaaf mohammed vhari ndi zwa ndeme vhukuma uri maafrika tshipembe nga mannḓa avho vha na malwadze a sa fholiho uri vha dzhie vhuḓifhinduleli ha mutakalo wavho.

src_text: abantu abanehlanganisela yamalwele angelaphekiko – njengobulwelebesifuba sommoya, umfutho weengazi ophakemeko, ubulwele beziso obungelaphekiko nebetjhukela – bangaba nengogwana icorona engeneleleko (icovid19), godu bangahlongakala ngonobangela wegandeleleko elenziwa yingogwana emzimbenabo.
tgt_text: vhathu vha re na malwadze a sa fholiho – u fana na asima, mutsiko wa nṱha wa malofha vhulwadze ha tswio vhu sa fholiho na ha swigiri – vha nga tshenzhema tsumbadwadze dza covid19 dzi re khombo, nahone vha nga lovha nga vhanga ḽa mutsiko une tshitzhili tsha hwedza mivhili yavho.

src_text: ngetjhudu, lokha umelaphi wekapa nongumma wabantwana abathathu uinsaaf mohammed (oneminyaka ema40) afunyanwa anengongwana icovid19 godu anobulwele besifuba sommoya (iasthma), wakghona ukulawula ihlanganisela yamalwele angelaphekiko la begodu akhange agule khulu.
tgt_text: mashudu mavhuya, musi occupational therapist na mme wa vhana vhararu vho insaaf mohammed (40) vho wanwa vha na covid19 musi vha na vhulwadze ha asima, vho kona u langa malwadze aya oṱhe nahone vha sa tou lwalesa.

src_text: umohammed wafumana ingogwana icovid19 kusobentwabakhe, osebenza elabhorathri yesibhedlela igroote schuur.
tgt_text: vho mohammed vho wana covid19 kha munna wavho, vha shumaho laborithari ya sibadela tsha groote schuur.

src_text: indodana kamohammed eneminyaka elikhomba nayo yafunyanwa inengogwana.
tgt_text: murwa wa vho mohammed wa miṅwaha ya sumbe na ene o ḓo kavhiwa nga dwadze.

src_text: ngemva kokufunyanwa banengogwana, bobathathu bazivalela ngekhaya.
tgt_text: nga murahu ha u wana uri vho kavhiwa, vhuraru havho vho ḓo ḓivalela hayani havho vha sa kwamane na vhaṅwe vhathu.

src_text: "sazivalela ngekamureni yethu, lokha unosokanami – onobulwele betjhukela nomfutho weengazi ophakemeko ngetjhudu ongakhange atheleleke ngengongwana – begade atjheja abentabethu ababili," kwatjho umohammed.
tgt_text: "ro ḓivalela kha lufhera lwa u eḓela, musi mazwale wanga – vhane vha vha na vhulwadze ha swigiri na mutsiko wa nṱha wa malofha, nga mashudu vha sa kavhiwe nga tshitzhili – vha ṱhogomela vhana vhashu vhaṅwe vhavhili," vho mohammed vha ralo.

src_text: ukuya ngokomnyangowezamaphilo wetjingalanga kapa, abantu abanomfutho weengazi ophakemeko, itjhukela nobulwele beziso obungelaphekiko bahlangana nabongazimbi behlanganisela yamalwele okungabangelwa yingongwana icovid19.
tgt_text: u ya nga muhasho wa mutakalo wa kapa vhukovhela, vhathu vha re na mutsiko wa nṱha wa malofha, vha re na vhulwadze ha swigiri na vhulwadze ha tswio vhu sa fholiho vha vhukati ha vhaṅwe vhalwadze vha re na malwadze a sa fholiho o ḓoweleaho vhukuma vha covid19.

src_text: ukuﬁ kela mhlana ama25 kumrhayili, abantu abanehlanganisela yamalwele alandelako bakhombisa amatshwayo angeneleleko ngokwamaphesente alandelako: umfutho weengazi ophakemeko, 58% ubulwele betjhukela, 56% ubulwele beziso obungelaphekiko, 17% ingogwana yentumbantonga (ihiv), 16% isifuba sommoya namkha ubulwele obungelaphekiko bokubhalelwa kuphefumula, 15% ubulwele behliziyo, 11% ukuba nomzimba omkhulu, 13% ubulwele besifuba, 13% ikankere, maphesente amabili amanye amalwele angelaphekiko, 16%.
tgt_text: u bva nga ḽa 25 shundunthule, vhathu vha re na malwadze a sa fholiho a tevhelaho vho sumbedza tsumbadwadze dzi re khombo: mutsiko wa nṱha wa malofha, phesenthe dza 58 vhulwadze ha swigiri, phesenthe dza 56 vhulwadze ha tswio vhu sa fholiho, phesenthe dza 17 hiv , phesenthe dza16 asima kana vhulwadze ha zwa u fema vhu sa fholiho, phesenthe dza 15 vhulwadze vhu elanaho na ha mbilu, phesenthe dza 11 u vha na muvhili wo kalulaho, phesenthe dza 13 lufhia, phesenthe dza 13 khentsa, phesenthe mbili maṅwe malwadze a sa fholiho, phesenthe dza 16. vho mohammed vha ri nyofho dzavho khulwanesa ho vha u tshenzhema u hulela ha u konḓelwa vhukuma u fema ho vhangwaho nga covid19.

src_text: umohammed uthi ivalo elikhulu kwaba mraro wokuphefumula kabudisi okwabangelwa yingogwana icovid19.
tgt_text: vha ri "ndo tshenzhema maneto, u hoṱola na u valea khanani, he phamphu yanga ya asima ya thusa.

src_text: ubeke wathi, "kade ngihlala ngidiniwe, ngikhohlela benginokugandeleleka kwesifuba, okwelatjhwa yipompo yami yobulwele besifuba sommoya.
tgt_text: tsumbadwadze dzanga dzo vha dzi sa tou vha khombo nga maanḓa u fana na dza munna wanga, vhe muvhili wavho wa vha u khou rema, vha tshi khou silingwa, khana yo valea, u fhelelwa nga mufemo, sainasi dzo thivha, tshilangwa tshidenya u bva khanani yavho na mufhiso muhulu.

src_text: amatshwayo wami bekangakarhagali njengewakasobentwabami, ogade aneenhlabi emzimbeni, afuna ukubuyisa, anesifuba esibopheneko, aphefumula kabudisi, avaleka iimpumulo, anesikhohlelo esidege esifubeni nomgomani.
tgt_text: murwa wanga o vha na mufhiso muhulu lwa maḓuvha mararu, fhedzi a fhola nga u ṱavhanya musi tsumbadwadze dzawe dzi tshi fhela.

src_text: indodanami yaba nomgomani amalanga amathathu, kodwana yaphola msinyana bona kungaphela amatshwayo wecovid19".
tgt_text: "muṱa wa vho mohammed wo tevhedza ndaela dzoṱhe dza tsiradwadze mushumoni na hayani, u thivhela u kavhiwa nga tshitzhili.

src_text: umndeni kamohammed gade uthobela yoke ikambiso yezamaphilo emsebenzini nekhaya, ukubalekela ukuthelelwa yingogwana.
tgt_text: "muṱa wanga wo vha u tshi pfesesa, u ṋea ndondolo na thikhedzo, vha tshi ri ḓisela zwiḽiwa zwa tshilalelo madekwana maṅwe na maṅwe, fhedzi tshiṅwe tshifhinga tshitshavha tsha havho tshi nga kha ḓi sa londa, na vhuṱungu vhu vhangwaho nga nyanḓadzamafhungo ya matshilisano vhu a tshuwisa," vho ralo vho mohammed.

src_text: "umndenami gade uzwisisa, unetjhejo begodu usinikela isekelo, begodu bebasilethela ukudla kwentambama ngamalanga, kodwana ngesinye isikhathi umphakathi awubi nezwelo netjhejo begodu ubuhlungu obubangwa mamezwi atlolwa eenkundleni zokuthintana buyakhahlumeza," kwatjho umohammed.
tgt_text: muhasho wa mutakalo wa kapa vhukovhela uri u dzula u na maḓi muvhilini na u vhea iṱo swigiri malofhani, mutsiko wa malofha na thempharetsha ndi zwa vhuṱhogwa kha u langa covid19, nga maanḓa kha vhalwadze vha re na malwadze a sa fholiho.

src_text: umnyango wezamaphilo wetjingalanga kapa uthi ukuhlala usela amanzi nokutjheja itjhukela eengazini, umfutho weengazi nomtjhiso kuqakathekile ekulawuleni ingogwana icovid19, khulukhulu eengulanini esele zinamalwele angelaphekiko nezicaphazeka lula ngecovid19.
tgt_text: zwiṅwe hafhu, muhasho wo eletshedza vhathu vha re na malwadze a sa fholiho uri: vha nwe mishonga nga nḓila yone, sa zwe vha randelwa nga dokotela wavho.

src_text: okhunye, umnyango ululeka abantu abanehlanganisela yamalwele angelaphekiko: ukusela iinhlahla ngefanelo, njengombala ulayelwe ngudorhodere nofana umsebenzi wezamaphilo.
tgt_text: vha ṱambe zwanḓa nga tshisibe na maḓi lwa mithethe i swikaho 20, phanḓa ha musi vha tshi fara mishonga miṅwe na miṅwe.

src_text: ukuhlamba izandla zakho ngesibha namanzi okungasenani imizuzwana ema20, ngaphambi kokuphatha iinhlahla.
tgt_text: vha songo litsha u nwa kana u shumisa mishonga nga nnḓa ha musi dokotela a tshi vha vhudza uri vha litshe nahone vha songo vhuya vha kovhelana mishonga na muṅwe muthu.

src_text: ukungalisi ukusela iinhlahla ngaphandle nayibe umsebenzi wezamaphilo akutjele bonyana ulise begodu ungabelani nomunye ngeenhlahla zakho.
tgt_text: vha lingedze u ita nyonyoloso lwa minithe dza 30 nga ḓuvha.

src_text: zama ukuthabulula umzimba imizuzu ema30 ngamalanga.
tgt_text: muhasho uri vhathu vha re na swigiri vha livhana na tshikhala tshihulwane tsha u tzhenzhema tsumbadwadze dzo kalulaho dzi re khombo u bva kha covid19, fhedzi khonadzeo ya khombo ya u lwalesa i vha fhasi arali vhulwadze ha swigiri havho vhu tshi khou langiwa zwavhuḓi.

src_text: umnyango uthi abantu abanetjhukela banethuba eliphezulu lokuhlangahlangana ngengogwana icovid19, kodwana ubungozi bokugula khulu buphasi lokha umuntu nakalawula itjhukelakhe kuhle.
tgt_text: "nga u angaredza, vhathu vha re na swigiri vha na khonadzeo khulwane ya u tshenzhema tsumbadwadze dzi re khombo na hulela ha vhulwadze musi vho kavhiwa nga tshitzhili.

src_text: "ngokuvamileko, abantu abanobulwele betjhukela ibagandelela khudlwana ingogwana yecorona nakwenzekileko yabangena.
tgt_text: sa izwi vhathu vha re na swigiri vha na khonadzeo khulwane ya u vha na tsumbadwadze dzi re khombo dza covid19, u dzulela u vha kule na muṅwe muthu zwo themendelwa hune zwa konadzea.

src_text: njengombana bababantu abasengozini ekulu yokungenwa yingogwana icovid19, kumele bazijayeze ukuqalangana nabantu namkha ukungayi esiphithiphithini.
tgt_text: u vha na muvhili muhulu na zwone ndi tshivhangi tsha khonadzeo ya u vha na covid19 i re khombo.

src_text: ukuba nomzimba omkhulu kunobungozi obukhulu bokungenwa bulwele becovid19 egandelelako.
tgt_text: nga u ralo, u fhungudza muvhili, arali zwi tshi konadzea zwi a themendelwa.

src_text: abantu bakhuthazwa bona behlise umzimba nakukghonakalako.
tgt_text: "u fhola tshoṱhe nga murahu ha u ḓivalela thungo lwa maḓuvha a 14, vho mohammed vho ḓo humela mushumoni.

src_text: "ukuphila sakangemva kokuzivalela amalanga ali14, umohammed wabuyela emsebenzini.
tgt_text: vha ri u fhola kha tshitzhili tsha corona zwo shandukisa kuhumbulele na kuvhonele kwavho kwa vhutshilo.

src_text: uthi ukuphola kilengogwana kwatjhugulula umkhumbulwakhe nendlela abona ngayo izinto epilweni.
tgt_text: vha ri "zwi ita uri u ṱanganedze vha muṱa wau na zwithu zwiṱuku vhutshiloni nga maanḓa.

src_text: "uthabela khulu umndenakho nezinto ezincani epilweni.
tgt_text: ndi ṱoḓa vhathu vha tshi dzhia vhuḓifhinduleli ha mutakalo wavho mishumoni na u funza vha muṱa wavho na vhana, nga maanḓa zwino vhana vha tshi khou vhuyelela zwikoloni.

src_text: ngifuna abantu kinofana ngibuphi ubujamo emsebenzini babe nokuziphendulela ngepilwabo nokufundisa imindenabo nabentwana, khulukhulu njengombana abentwana babuyele esikolweni nje.
tgt_text: kha vha thuse ṅwana wavho nḓila dza vhuṱali dza u sumbedza khonani dzawe lufuno, hu si na u sendela tsini na u farana.

src_text: "siza umntanakho afumane iindlela eziphephileko zokuthabela abangani, ngaphandle kokutjhidelana nabo nokubathinta.
tgt_text: kha vha ite uri vha muṱa wavho vha shumise zwivhulahatshitzhili phanḓa ha musi vha tshi dzhena nḓuni, u sia zwienda nnḓa garatshini arali vha tshi kona, vha bvule zwiambaro zwoṱhe vha ṱambe phanḓa ha musi vha tshi lumelisa vha muṱa wavho na u ṱhogomela vhukuma kha sia ḽa mutakalo u itela u vha tsireledza.

src_text: qinisekisabonyana umndenakho uyazihlanzekisa ngaphambi kokungena ngekhaya, tjhiya amanyathelo wakho ngegratjhi nakukghonakalako, hlubula izembatho zakho uhlambe ngaphambi kokulotjhisa umndenakho begodu uyelele ngezamaphilo ukubavikela," watjho njalo.
tgt_text: "muhasho u eletshedza vhathu vha re na malwadze a sa fholiho u ḽa zwiḽiwa zwa mutakalo, u ita nyonyoloso tshifhinga tshoṱhe, u langa mutsiko wavho, u tevhedza pulane ya mishonga ya dzilafho na u tevhedza maga oṱhe a thivhelo o teaho.

src_text: umnyango weluleka abantu abanehlanganisela yamalwele angelaphekilo nabacaphazeleka lula ngecovid19 bonyana badle ukudla okunepilo, bathabulule umzimba qobe, balawule ukutshwenyeka emmoyeni, bathobele ikambiso yokusela iinhlahla nokulandela woke amagadango afaneleko wokuzivikela.
tgt_text: vnga mashudu vha sa kavhiwe nga tshitzhili – vha ṱhogomela vhana vhashu vhaṅwe vhavhili," vho mohammed vha ralo.

src_text: nga kapa, abantu abanomfutho weengazi ophakemeko, itjhukela nobulwele beziso obungelaphekiko philo emsebenzini nekhaya, ukubalekela ukuthelelwa yingogwana.
tgt_text: u ya nga muhasho wa mutakalo wa kapa vhukovhela, vhathu vha re na mutsiko wa nṱha wa malofha, vha re na vhulwadze ha swigiri na vhulwadze ha tswio vhu sa fholiho vha vhukati ha vhaṅwe vhalwadze vha re na malwadze a sa fholiho o ḓoweleaho vhukuma vha covid19 .

src_text: "umndenami gade uzwisisa, unetjhejo begodu usinikela isekelo, begodu bebasilethela ukudla kwentambama ngamalanga, kodwana ngesinye isikhathi umphakathi awubi nezwelo netjhejo begodu ubuhlungu obubangwa mamezwi uinsaaf mohammed onobulwele besifuba sommoya (iasthma), welulamile bewehlula icovid19.
tgt_text: fholiho, phesenthe dza 16. vho mohammed vha ri nyofho dzavho khulwanesa ho muṱa wa vho mohammed wo tevhedza ndaela dzoṱhe dza tsiradwadze mushumoni na hayani, u thivhela u kavhiwa nga tshitzhili.

src_text: nawunamatshwayo amanye namanye, njengomgomani, ukukhohlela namkha ukuphefumula kabudisi, dosela umtato wesizo ngengogwana icovid19 ku: 0800 029 999 namkha uthumele umlayezo othi "hi" enomborweni yewhatsapp ethi: 0600 123 456.
tgt_text: mme vha na malwadze a sa fholi vho kunda covid19 silusapho nyanda vho insaaf mohammed vhari ndi zwa ndeme vhukuma uri maafrika tshipembe nga mannḓa avho vha na malwadze a sa fholiho uri vha dzhie vhuḓifhinduleli ha mutakalo wavho.

src_text: indlela ekhethekileko yokuthokoza abasebenzi bekoro yezamaphilo yelizweloke vukuzenzele unnnamed abantu esele babulewe yicoronavirus mhlaphanje sele beqe eenkulungwaneni ezimbili.
tgt_text: ndivhuwo dzo khetheaho kha vhashumi vha ndondolamutakalo vhashu vukuzenzele unnamed tshivhalo tsha dzimpfu dza tshitzhili tsha corona zwa zwino tsho paḓa 2000. kha vho lovhaho hu na vhashumi vha ndondolamutakalo, vho ramaṱalimakone vhe vha ṱhogomela vha lwalaho, nahone vhe vha vha thikhedzo na mukhuthadzi kha avho vha re sibadela vho khethelwaho thungo kha miṱa yavho.

src_text: hlangana nalabo ababulewe yingogwana le kubalwa nabasebenzi bekoro yezam aphilo nabosokghono fundwa bezamaphilo abalole ke nga phezu kobukhali, abebatjheja abantu abagulako, abebabasekeli nabaduduzi kilabo abahl ukaniswe nemindeni yabo bayokulaliswa esibhedlela.
tgt_text: zwauri vhanna na vhafumakadzi vho hwalaho mushumo wo khetheaho na u ṱhonifheaho na vhone vha khou kavhiwa nga vhulwadze vha lovha ndi zwithu zwi vhaisaho vhukuma.

src_text: kulinceba elidabula ihliziyo ukubona amadoda nabomma abenza lomsebenzi omkhulu nocwenge kangaka nabo babanjwa bulwelobu bebubehlule.
tgt_text: vha tou vha tshivhindini tsha u lwa na dwadze iḽi.

src_text: ngibo abaphambili epini yokucitha ubulwele oburhageleko.
tgt_text: vha shuma vhe fhasi ha mutsiko muhulu nahone vha tea u hwala mutsiko kha muhumbulo u ḓivha zwauri vha tou vha kha khonadzeo ya khombo ya u nga kavhiwa nga vairasi.

src_text: basebenza ebujameni obubudisi khulu begodu kufuze baqunge isibindi, babhesele ukuraga umsebenzabo basazi kuhle nje ukuthi basengozini yokungenwa ngiyo ingogwana le.
tgt_text: vha tou vha vhahali vhukuma kha nndwa yashu ya u lwisana na tshitzhili tsha corona .

src_text: baziingorho zamambala epini yethu necoronavirus .
tgt_text: ri nea ṱhompho vhahali avha vha afrika tshipembe vhe vha ṱutshela mahaya avho, miṱa na vhafunwa vhavho vha ya mushumoni dzikiḽiniki vha sa fhidzi ḓuvha ḽiṅwe na ḽiṅwe.

src_text: siwethulela ingwani la masewula afrika asuka emizinawo, emakhabo ayokusebenza ngaphandle kokuqintelisa nofana ukulova, basebenza ngamalanga ematlinigi, eembhedlela nakamanye amaziko wetjhejo lezamaphilo.
tgt_text: vha afho vha ṋetshedza ndondolo ya zwa dzilafho, thikhedzo ya zwa ndaulo na dziṅwe tshumelo dzi ngaho u kunakisa na u fha zwiḽiwa.

src_text: lapho atjheja ngeenhlahla zokwelapha, asekele ngesizo eliphathelene neencwadi neminye imisetjenzana efana nokubutha kunye nokuphakisa ngokudla.
tgt_text: musi vha tshi khou ita mushu mo wavho we vha gudela, na riṋevho ri na vhuḓifhinduleli khavho na miṱa yavho.

src_text: njengoba nabo basenza umse benzabo wobukghonofundwa babo nje, nathi sinesibopho phezu kwemindeni yabo.
tgt_text: mutakalo wavho na tsireledzo yavho zwi tea u vha zwone zwa ndeme.

src_text: ipilwabo nokuphepha kwabo kufuze kubekwe phambili.
tgt_text: ri a vha ṱhonifha na u vha tikedza sa vhanna na vhafumakadzi vhe vha sumbedza uri vho ḓiimisela u vhea vhutshilo havho kha khonadzeo ya khombo vha tshi itela uri ri tshile.

src_text: siyabahlonipha besibethulela ingwani njengamadoda nabomma abatjengise ukuthi bazini kelele ukunikela ngepilwabo ukuhlenga yethu ipilo.
tgt_text: khavho u ita mushumo wavho u ṱoḓaho vhuḓifhinduleli vhuhulwane vha ṱoḓa thikhedzo yashu khathihi na tsireledzo nga u ṋetshedza zwishumiswa zwa u tsireledza muthu ene muṋe (ppe).

src_text: u kuthi bakghone ukwenza lomsebenzi wobukutani bafuna nesekelo lethu kunye nokuvikeleka ngokutholakala kweensetjenziswa zokuzivikela ( amappe).
tgt_text: nga kha thikhedzo ya tshikwama tsha mulanga na ndambedzo dzi bvaho kha vhunzhi ha vhathu vha afrika tshipembe, mabindu, dzifoundesheni na miṅwe mivhuso, ro kona u wana zwishumiswa zwa u tsireledza muthu ene muṋe hu tshi itelwa mihaga iyi ya vhashumi vha re tshivhindini.

src_text: ngesekelo lesikhwama soku zwelana nangeminikelo ebuya ebantwini abanengi ngamunye ngamunye abamasewula afrika, abosomabhizinisi, iinhlangano zezwelo naborhulumende, siphumelele ukuthola iinsetjenziswa zokuzivikela zokuvikela abasebenzi abadosa phambili kilepi nofana amaforosi.
tgt_text: he ha vha hu na ṱhahalelo ya zwishumiswa zwa u tsireledza muthu ene muṋe (ppe) zwibadela zwashu zwi khou sedzana nazwo nga u ṱavhanya u vhona uri zwi vhe hone.

src_text: la kunetlhayelo yamappe khona iimbhedlela zelizwe lekhethu zikutjheja ngokurhabekileko lokho ngomnqopho wokuqinisekisa ukuthi ayatholakala amappe.
tgt_text: ri a ḓivha zwauri u swikela zwishumiswa zwa u tsireledza muthu ene muṋe (ppe) a si yone khaedu i yoṱhe ine vhashumi vha ndondolamutakalo vhashu vha ṱangana nayo.

src_text: siyazi ukuthi ukukghona ukuthola amappe akusikuphela komraro abasebenzi bekoro yezamaphilo abaqalene nawo.
tgt_text: u mona na shango dzikiḽiniki na zwibadela zwi khou ṱangana na khaedu dza ṱhahalelo ya vhashumi.

src_text: kilo loke ilizweli amatlinigi neembhedlela ziqalene nokutlhayela kwabasebenzi.
tgt_text: thaidzo iyi i khou sedziwa.

src_text: nawo lomraroke uyatjhejwa.
tgt_text: u tikedza mushumo une vhashumi vhashu vha re tshivhidzini vha khou ita u mona na shango ri khou rumela dziminisṱa na vhafarisa dziminisṱa kha tshiṱiriki tshiṅwe na tshiṅwe kha shango u ya u wanulusa khaedu nkene kha zwiṱiriki izwi na u shuma na vha maanḓalanga vha zwa mutakalo kha vundu.

src_text: ukusekela umsebenzi owenziwa maforosi welizwe lekhethu abasebenzi bezamaphilo elizweni lokeli, sithumela abongqongqotjhe namase kela wabongqongqotjhe kesinye nesinye isiyingi kobanyana bayozibonela ngewabo imiraro ekuqalenwe nayo kileziinyingi begodu bebasebenzisane ngokusizana neemphathimandla zekoro yezamaphilo eemfundeni ngeemfunda.
tgt_text: ri tea u shumisana u tsireledza mutakalo hu si wa vhashumi vha re tshivhindini fhedzi, fhedzi na u itela na vhashumi vhoṱhe.

src_text: kufuze sisebenzisane ukuphe phisa ipilo hayi yabasebenzi kwaphela, kodwana neyabo boke abasebenzi ngokuphelela kwabo.
tgt_text: zwa zwino hu na mushumo wavhuḓi uno khou itwa nga madzangano wa u funza miraḓo nga zwa ndango ya phirela, u thivhela na tsiravhulwadze.

src_text: besele vele kunomsebenzi omuhle okubabazekako owenzi we mayuniyoni ekufundiseni amalunga wawo malungana nokuthelelana nokuvikela ukuthe lelana kunye nehlanzekiso.
tgt_text: vha khou tikedza mushumo wa muhasho wa zwa mushumo na vhashumi kha u tshimbidza zwa vhuṱoli ha mushumoni u vhona uri matshimbidzele a zwa tsireledzo na mutakalo a kha ngona u itela vhashumi vha no khou humela mushumoni.

src_text: godu asekela umsebenzi womnyango wezokuqatjha nezabasebenzi ekuhloleni iindawo zemisebenzi kobanyana kuzokuqinisekiseka ukuthi iyalandelwa ikambiso yezamaphilo nezokuphepha phezu kwabasebenzi ababuyele emsebenzini.
tgt_text: vhunzhi ha madzangano ashu a vhashumi a khou ṋetshedza mafhungo nga ha tshitzhili tsha corona kha miraḓo yao nahone vhatholi vha khou tshimbidza mafulo a u tsivhudza.

src_text: amayuniyoni wethu amanengi asabalalisa ilwazi ngengogwana icoro na emalungeni wawo kanti abaqatjhi nabo basemajimeni wokuphandlulula.
tgt_text: iṅwe ya khaedu yo ṱahaho kha shango ḽashu ndi u shata samba vhathu vhe vha itwa ndingo vha wanala uri vha na tshitzhili tsha corona .

src_text: omunye wemiraro evelileko elizweni lekhethwapha kunindeka kwabantu nofana ukubekwa amabala abatholakele banengogwana yecorona .
tgt_text: sa tshitshavha, ri na vhuḓifhinduleli roṱhe ha u fhelisa zwa u shata samba vhathu vho kavhiwaho nga tshitzhili tsha corona.

src_text: njengomphakathi, sinomsebenzi osibopho esiwuhlanganyeleko wokucitha ukunindeka kwabantu abangenwe yicoronavirus .
tgt_text: ho vha na mivhigo i vhaisaho ya vhathu vhe vha thudzelwa thungo nga tshitshavha tsha havho, ha vha na tshitshavha tshe tsha gwalabela vhalwadze vha re na tshitzhili tsha corona musi vha tshi khou ṱanganedzwa kha zwibadela na kiḽiniki dzapo.

src_text: kunemibiko ezwisa ubuhlungu yabantu abaninwakoemphakathini wangekhabo nemiphakathi etjhagalela iingulani eziphethwe sisifo esibangwa yicoronavirus ithi leziingulani azikwazi ukulaliswa eembhedlela zendawo nematlinigi wendawo.
tgt_text: hezwi zwi tea u ima.

src_text: kufuze kupheleke koke lokhu.
tgt_text: sa zwe ra ṱangana roṱhe u ṱuṱuwedza zwa u ṱanganedza vhathu vha tshilaho vhe na hiv ra imedzana ra lwisana na zwa u ponda, ri tea u sumbedza u pfesesa, u konḓelela, vhuhwavho na u pfela vhuṱungu miṱa ya vho kavhiwaho khathihi na avho vho kavhiwaho nga vairasi iyi.

src_text: njengoba sabumbana uku khwezelela ukwamukeleka kwabantu abanengogwana yentumbantonga (ihiv) ebanga ubulwele bentumbantonga, sajama sasimelela besacitha ukwe nziwa kwabantu abongazimbi ngabomu, ngokunjalo kufuze sitjengise ukuzwa, ukubekezelelana, isisa, ukurhawukelana nokutjhejana kilabo abangenwe ngilengogwana nemindenini yabo.
tgt_text: zwo ambiwa uri zwa u shata samba zwi itiswa nga nyofho dza u shavha u kavhiwa nga vhulwadze na u sa pfesesa.

src_text: batjho lokhu kunindeka kubaselwa livalo lokuthi abantu abanganangogwana yecorona nabo bazakungenwa yingogwa na le, kubaselwe nanga kutlhaye lelwa lilwazi.
tgt_text: nḓila ya khwiṋe ya u kunda nyofho dza vhulwadze na dza u kavhiwa ndi u tevhedza maitele a tsiravhulwadze ane a vha hone.

src_text: indlela ehle khulu yokuqeda ivalo lethu elisukaemizweni eziphakamelako ngesifo kunye naso isifo secovid19 kuthobela imibandela yehlanzekiso ebekiweko.
tgt_text: u ofha u kavhiwa zwi tou dzula zwi kha muthu nahone ndi zwa vhukuma.

src_text: ukuba nevalo ngokutheleleka kuyezwakala begodu kuyinto ekhona mbala.
tgt_text: ri tshi kha zwenezwo, ri a ḓivha zwine ra tea u ita u ḓitsireledza na u tsireledza vhaṅwe.

src_text: kodwana ngakelinye ihlangothi nathi siyazi kobana kufuze senzeni ukuzivikela sivikele nabanye.
tgt_text: ri a ḓivha zwine zwa vhanga vairasi na zwine ra nga ita u itela u ḓitsireledza kha u kavhiwa.

src_text: siyazi ukuthi ingogwana le ibangwa yini, siyazi nokuthi kufanele senzeni ukuzivikela kobana singazokutheleleka.
tgt_text: ri a zwi ḓivha uri ri tea u dzula ro sia tshikhala vhukati ha iwe muṋe na muṅwe muthu, u ḓikhethela thungo arali ro ṱangana na avho vho kavhiwaho na u ya sibadela arali ri na tsumbadwadze.

src_text: siyazi bona kufuze siqalangane, sizikhethele ngeqadi nayibe sikhe sahlangana nabantu abanesifo secoronavirus , siyazi nokuthi kufuze siye esibhedlela nayibe sinamatshayo wecovid19 .
tgt_text: ri tea u dzula ri tshi khou langwa nga mafhungo a vhukuma hu si mavharivhari.

src_text: kumele ngeenkhathi zoke silandele ilwazi eliliqiniso ngezinto ezenzeka mbala, hayi izwangobatjho, kikho kokeesikwenzako.
tgt_text: tshifhinga tshe muthu a vha a tshi nga ri ha ḓivhi muthu o kavhiwaho kana a kwameaho nga tshitzhili tsha corona tsho fhira kale.

src_text: kade sadlula isikhathi soku thi abantu bathi abazi muntu onecoronavirus namkha ocaphazelekileko ngayo.
tgt_text: zwa zwino, nṱha ha izwo, khonani dzashu, miṱa, vhashumisani na vhahura vha ṱoḓa khuthadzo na thikhedzo yashu.

src_text: nje, khulu khulu ukudlula phambilini, abangani bethu, umndenethu, abalingani bethu bomsebenzi kunye nabomakhelwana badinge izwelo nesekelo lethu.
tgt_text: kha maḓuvha, dzivhege na miṅwedzi i ḓaho, tshiṅwe tshifhinga ri ḓo ḓiwana ri tshi shaya fhulufhelo na u ḓala nyofho musi ri tshi vhona tshivhalo tsha vhathu vho kavhiwaho na vha lovhaho tshi tshi khou engedzea tshi tshi ya nṱha.

src_text: emalangeni, eemvekeni neenyangeni ezizako, kesinye isikhathi sisezazithola sisevalweni elikhulu, sidane singasazi ukuthi sithatheni sihlanganise nani nasibona basanda abantu abangenwe yingogwana, basanda nabantu ababulawa sisifesi.
tgt_text: zwi ḓo vha hu uri zwithu zwo vhifha vhukuma, fhedzi ri a fhulufhela uri zwi ḓo vha khwiṋe.

src_text: kuzabe kukumbi khulu ngesikhatheso, kodwana kuzakubuye kube ngcono.
tgt_text: vhaeletshedzi vha zwa dzilafho na vhorasaintsi vhashu vho ri vhudza uri phimo ya u kavhiwa i ḓo ya nṱha musi ri tshi ya tsini na maṱhakhe azwo.

src_text: abososayensi nabodorhodere bekhethu basitjele ukuthiinani labantu abazokungenwa yingogwana le basazokwanda ngokukhamba kwesikhathi nasiya esiqongolweni sesifesi.
tgt_text: fhedzi zwi ḓo tsela fhasi.

src_text: kodwana nakanjani sizakugcina sirhobhile.
tgt_text: ri ṱhonifha na u khoḓa vhashu mi vha ndondolamutakalo vhe vha lovha musi vha tshi khou ṱhogomela vhalwadze.

src_text: siyabathokoza, sibethulela ingwani abasebenzi bezamaphilo ababhubhe basendimeni yokuhlenga abagulako.
tgt_text: ri tshi khou vha elelwa, kha ri dzule ri tshi ḓitsireledza na u tsireledza vhadzulapo vhashu nga u ita tshipiḓa tshashu.

src_text: njeke njengesikhumbuzo sabo, asizilonde sihlale siphephile siphephise nezinye izakhamuzi zekhethu ngokwenza okulungi leko ekufuze sikwenze.
tgt_text: ri ḓo kunda vairasi hei ra fhaṱulula tshitshavha tshashu.

src_text: sizayehlula ingogwana le sibe siwuvuselele umphakathi welizwe lekhethu.
tgt_text: ro vhona zwifhinga zwi konḓaho nahone ro kunda.

src_text: sakhe sabona iinkhathi zobumnyama ezidlula lezi, sadlula kizo besaphundlukela nganeno.
tgt_text: ndivhuwo dzo khetheaho kha vhashumi vha ndondolamutakalo vhashu vukuzenzele unnamed tshivhalo tsha dzimpfu dza tshitzhili tsha corona zwa zwino tsho paḓa 2000. kha vho lovhaho hu na vhashumi vha ndondolamutakalo, vho ramaṱalimakone vhe vha ṱhogomela vha lwalaho, nahone vhe vha vha thikhedzo na mukhuthadzi kha avho vha re sibadela vho khethelwaho thungo kha miṱa yavho.

src_text: umlimi/umfuyi omumuntu omutjha ufumana isekelo lesikhwama secovid19 silusapho nyanda umlimi/umfuyi wepumalanga kapa osakhasako ungomunye walabo abasizwa ngeemali zombuso zokubakhokhisa ummoya ebujameni becoronavirus .
tgt_text: muswa wa rabulasi o ṱanganedza thikhedzo ya covid19 silusapho nyanda rabulasi wa kapa vhukovhela ane a khou bvelela ndi muṅwe wa vhavhuelwa vha tshikwama tsha ndiliso ya tshitzhili tsha corona tsha muvhuso.

src_text: unomagcinandile suduka (oneminyaka ema27) ukhulisa ilifa lakwabo ngokusisisa kezokulima nokufuya.
tgt_text: nomagcinandile suduka wa miṅwaha ya 27 u khou alusa lupfumo na ifa ḽa muṱa wa hawe nga u bindu dza kha zwa vhulimi.

src_text: umnikazi we4 u and 4 me primary cooperative endaweni yemooiplaas usekelwa sikhwama sokukhokhisa ummoya ebujameni becoronavirus (icovid19) somnyango wezokulima, ukubuyiselwa kwenarha nokuthuthukiswa kweendawo zemakhaya ngamaqanda, nefuyo kunye neplasi yokutjala imirorho.
tgt_text: muṋe wa 4 u and 4 me pri mary cooperative ngei kusini kwa mooiplaas o ṱanganedza thikhedzo i bvaho kha tshikwama tsha ndiliso ya tshitzhili tsha corona (covid19) tsha muhasho wa mveledziso ya mahayani, mbuedzedzo ya mavu na zwa vhulimi u itela bulasi yawe ya miroho, zwifuwo na makumba.

src_text: umnyango ukhuphe amavawutjha wemali eyir1.2 yamabhiliyoni enikelwa abosoplasi abasemtlhagweni.
tgt_text: muhasho wo ṋetshedza r1.2 biḽioni ya dzivoutshara kha vhorabulasi vhane vha vha na ṱhoḓea.

src_text: unomagcinandile uthi amavawutjha wakhe azamsiza ekukhuliseni ihlangothi lebhizinisi yakhe elisebenza ngamaqanda.
tgt_text: suduka o amba uri voutshara dzi ḓo mu thusa u alusa sia ḽa vhubveledzi ha makumba ḽa bindu ḽawe.

src_text: "ngithole amavawutjha amathathu ahlanganisa imali eyir19 000. ivawutjha yer12 000 yokuthenga iinkukhu zamaqanda ezilikhulu, ivawutjha yer6 500 yokuthenga ukudla kween kukhu kunye nevawutjha yer500 yokuthenga iinhlahla."
tgt_text: "ndo ṱanganedza voutshara tharu dza ṱhanganyela ya r19 000. voutshara ya r12 000 ya u renga khuhu dza makumba dza 100, voutshara ya r6 500 ya u renga zwiḽiwa na voutshara ya r500 ya u renga mishonga.

src_text: uthome iplasakhe yokubhura ngamaqanda ngokupha iinkukhu zekhabo ukudla kokuthengwa okukhulisa iinkukhu, okuzenza zibekele ngaphandle kokuhlangana nemikukurumba.
tgt_text: "o thoma bulasi yawe ya u bveledza makumba nga u fusha khuhu dza hayani nga zwiḽiwa zwa u alusa khuhu dzi no khou alamela, zwine zwa konisa u bveledza makumba nga khuhu dzi songo gombiwa.

src_text: iinkukhu zakhe ezima50 njenganje sezibekela ama50 wamaqanda ngelanga, awathengisa qobe veke.
tgt_text: khuhu dzawe dza 50 zwa zwino dzi bveledza makumba a 50 nga ḓuvha ane a a rengisa vhege iṅwe na iṅwe.

src_text: unomagcinandile, obuye abe mfuyi weembuzi ezima73, nezimvu ezima25, neenkomo ezima25 uthome ukusebenza ngeplasi ngomnyaka wee2015 ngemva kokuthola kwakhe isitifikethi sepublic management n6 ekhala training and voca tional education and training college.
tgt_text: suduka, ane a fuwa mbudzi dza 73, nngu dza 25 na kholomo dza 25, o thoma zwa vhulimivhufuwi nga 2015 nga murahu ha musi o wana ṱhanziela ya n6 ya public management kha gudedzi ḽa vhugudisi ya ikhala na kha gudedzi ḽa vhugudisi na pfunzo ya mushumo wa zwanḓa.

src_text: ngemva kokulimuka ukuthi amathuba womsebenzi ayindlala, waqunta ukuthatha iplasi yekhabo abebaziphilisa ngayo wayenza ibhizinisi eyenza imali.
tgt_text: musi o vhona uri shangoni a hu na zwikhala zwinzhi zwa mushumo, o humbula u dzhia vhuḓifhinduleli ha bulasi u unḓa muṱa wa hawe a i shandukisa ya vha bindu ḽi bveledzaho mbuelo.

src_text: ubeke wathi:"sikhule silima besifuya, ngalokhoke ngemva kokuthola kwami iziqu zefundo ngabona kungcono ngirage umsebenzi wokulima nokufuya kunobanyana ngifune umsebenzi."
tgt_text: suduka o amba uri: "ro alu wa ri tshi ita zwa vhurabulasi, zwo ralo nga murahu ha musi ndo ṱhaphudza ngudo dzanga ndo humbula u vha rabulasi u fhirisa zwa u ya u ṱoḓa mushumo."

src_text: lokhuke kubonakele ukuthi kube siqunto esihle esikhuthazako, ngoba zandile iimbuzi neenkomo azifuyileko namhlanjesi.
tgt_text: hezwi zwo sumbedza u vha tsheo yo ṱuṱuwedzwaho, sa i zwi o alusa mbudzi na kholomo dzo vhalaho.

src_text: iplasi kanomagcinandile emahagere amathandathu utjala kiyo umumbu/isiphila, amazambana, iphizi kunye neembhontjisi.
tgt_text: bulasi ya miroho ya hekithara dza rathi ya suduka i bveledza mavhele, maḓabula, eregisi na ṋawa.

src_text: umumbu/isiphila sitjalwa emahagereni amane, amazambana atjalwe ehagereni linye bese kuthi iphizi neembhontjisi zihlanganyele ihagere lokugcina.
tgt_text: mavhele a ṱavhiwa kha hekithara nṋa, maḓabula kha hekithara nthihi ngeno eregisi na ṋawa zwi tshi ṋekana hekithara yo salaho.

src_text: usuduka ufunde okunengi ngecovid19 , khulukhulu ukuthi ilifa lakhe elikhulu kinawo woke zizandla zakhe nokukhuthala.
tgt_text: suduka o guda zwinzhi kha covid19 , nga maanḓa zwa uri ndaka dzawe dza nṱhesa ndi zwanḓa zwawe na u shuma nga maanḓa.

src_text: unomagcinandile suduka uphendule iplasekhabo yokulimela nokufuyela ukuziphilisa wayenza ibhinizinisi encani.
tgt_text: muswa wa rabulasi o ṱanganedza thikhedzo ya covid19 silusapho nyanda rabulasi wa kapa vhukovhela ane a khou bvelela ndi muṅwe wa vhavhuelwa vha tshikwama tsha ndiliso ya tshitzhili tsha corona tsha muvhuso.

src_text: isewula afrika isikimela ukulungisa umraro wokutlhayela kweemphefumulisi silusapho nyanda isiphefumulisi esikhandwe khona lapha ekhethu sizakusiza iingulani ezinamatshwayo alula wecovid19 ukuthi ziphefumule lula.
tgt_text: afrika tshipembe ḽi khou shuma u tandulula thaidzo ya ṱhahelelo ya venthiḽeitha silusapho nyanda venthiḽeitha dzi bveledzwaho fhano hayani dzi ḓo thusa vhalwadze vha re na tsumbadwadze dza covid19 dzine dzi sa vhe khombo nga maanḓa uri vha kone u fema zwo leluwa.

src_text: ipi yokulwa nesifo secovid19 esewula afrika iqiniswe amandla siphefumulisi sokuthoma esikhandwe lapha elizweni lekhethu.
tgt_text: nndwa ya u lwa na vhulwadze ha tshitzhili tsha corona (covid19) afrika tshipembe yo khwaṱhiswa nga venthiḽeitha dza u tou thoma u itwa shangoni ḽashu.

src_text: lesisiphefumulisi, esibizwa ngokuthi yicpap , sisiza iingulani ezinamatshwayo alula wecovid19 ukuphefumula lula ngokupompela isigulani ummoya oneoksijini elingeneko kobanyana iindlela ezikhambisa ummoya emzimbeni zizokuhlala zivulekile.
tgt_text: venthiḽeitha ya continuous positive airway pressure (cpap) i thusa vhalwadze vha re na tsumbadwadze dza covid19 dzine dza sa vhe khombo nga maanḓa u fema zwo leluwa u ṋetshedza ḽevele yo linganelaho ya mutsiko wa muya u re na okisidzheni u itela uri nḓila dza u tshimbidza muya dzi dzule dzo vulea.

src_text: lesisiphefumulisi sitlanywe mkhandlu wezokurhubhulula ngesayensi nezamabubulo (icsir), ngokusebenzisana nababelani abambadlwana bakhona lapha ekhethu begodu sizokutholakala kilo loke ilizweli eengulaneni ezitjengisa umgadangiso 1amatshwayo wokwehliwa yicovid19.
tgt_text: venthiḽeitha yo oliwa nga khoro ya ṱhoḓisiso na zwa nḓowetshumo ya zwa saintsi (csir) nga kha tshumisano na vhashumisani vha tshivhalo vhapo nahone i ḓo ṋetshedzwa u mona na shango kha vhalwadze vhane vha khou sumbedza u vha na vhuleme ha u fema mathomoni a u kavhiwa nga covid19.

src_text: "ummoya ophefumulwa mumuntu uvamise ukuba nama23% weoksijini.
tgt_text: "muya une muthu a anzela u u fema u na phesenthe dza 23 dzo ḓalaho nga okisidzheni.

src_text: isiphefumulisi icpap ingapompa umthamo ophezulu weoksijini, isize umuntu ukuphefumula.
tgt_text: venthiḽeitha ya cpap i nga bommba okisidzheni nga vhunzhi, i tshi khou thusa muthu u fema.

src_text: ungawukhuphula namkha uwehlise umthamo weoksijini ophefumulwa mumuntu," kutjho umphathi olawulako kwacsir future production: manufacturing, umartin sanne.
tgt_text: cpap i bommba okisidzheni yo ḓalaho u ya ngauralo.

src_text: iingulani ezisebenzisa isiphefumulisi zifakelwa sona ngemaski.
tgt_text: vha nga gonyisa kana vha fhungudza tshikalo tsha okisidzheni ine muthu a khou i fema, " vha ralo mulanguli muhulwane wa csir future production: manufacturing vho martin sanne .

src_text: ioksjini idoswa etankeni yayo bese ihlanganiswa nommoya wemvelo ngesiphefumulisini, ukusuka lapho idluliselwa emaskini bese iphefumulwa sigulani.
tgt_text: vhalwadze vha shumisaho venthiḽeitha vha ṱumanyiwa nayo nga kha masiki wa khofheni.

src_text: usanne uthi ngaphandle kokupompa ummoya oneoksijini, icpap ibuye godu isize iingulani ukuphefumulela ngaphandle.
tgt_text: okisidzheni i kokodzwa u bva kha thannge ḽa gese ya okisidzheni ya ṱanganyiswa na muya mufhe kha venthiḽeitha,une u bva afho ya fhiriselwa kha masiki wa kona u femiwa nga mulwadze.

src_text: isiphefumulisi icpap singasetjenziswa necwephetjhe lezinga eliphezulu kunye neendaweni zesikhatjhana, njengeembhedlela zesikhatjhana zesizo elirhabako kunye neendaweni zokukhethelwa ngeqadi kwabantu nofana zokuvalelwa wedwa.
tgt_text: vho sanne vha ri u ḓadzisa kha u bommba muya u re na okisidzheni, cpap i dovha ya thusa vhalwadze u femela nnḓa.

src_text: usanne uthi kuzakuthi kuphela urhoboyi icsir ibe seyikhande iinkulungwana ezilitjhumi zeemphefumulisi.
tgt_text: tshishumiswa tsha cpap tshi nga shumiswa hoṱhe fhethu ha zwa dzilafho ḽa vhalwadze ha thekhinoḽodzhi ya nṱha na kha nzudzanyo dza tshifhinga nyana, u fana na zwibadela zwa tshifhinga nyana na zwiimiswa zwa u valela vha khou lwalaho.

src_text: ngokusebenzisana nesiemens, nesimera, neakacia, negabler, umoya kunye neyunivesithi yekapa, icsir ikhande isiphefumulisi icpap ngokwekambiso namazinga wehlangano yezamaphilo yephasiloke (iwho).
tgt_text: vho sanne vha ri csir i ḓo vha yo no bveledza dziventhiḽeitha dza 10 000 mafheloni a ṱhangule.

src_text: iimphefumulisi zokuthoma zizokunikelwa iimbhedlela zombuso ezinesidingo khulu ngenca yefuneko yeensetjenziswa zokwelapha icovid19.
tgt_text: i tshi khou shumisana na siemens, simera, akacia, gabler, umoya na yunivesithi ya cape town, csir yo bveledza cpap u ya nga tshilingano tsha zwa dzangano ḽa mutakalo ḽa ḽifhasi.

src_text: icsir ithome ukusebenza ngecpap ngemva kobana iphasi loke lithome ukutlhayelelwa ziimphefumulisi khulu.
tgt_text: betshe ya u thoma ya dziventhiḽeitha i ḓo ṋetshedzwa zwibadela zwa muvhuso zwine zwa khou tshenzhema mutsiko nga vhanga ḽa u sa vha hone ha tshomedzo dza u thusa vhalwadze vha covid19.

src_text: "ngeenkhathi zikantaka nosihlabantangana, kuthome ukutlhayela kweemphefumulisi kubasabalalisi bethu bamazwe ngamazwe.
tgt_text: csir yo thoma u shuma zwa cpap nga murahu ha musi ḽifhasi ḽi tshi khou tshenzhema ṱhahelelo khulwane vhukuma ya dziventhiḽeitha.

src_text: lapho bezisatholakala khona besele zibiza imali enengi khulu, ngalokhoke urhulumende wakhupha ithenda yokuthi kukhandwe iimphefumulisi," kutjho usanne.
tgt_text: "henefha nga ṱhafamuhwe na lambamai, ho ḓo thoma u vha na ṱhahelelo ya ṋetshedzo ya dziventhiḽeitha u bva kha vhaṋetshedzi vhashu vha dzitshaka.

src_text: ithenda ekhutjhiweko le beyiyingcenye yehlelo likarhulumende inational ventilator project yelizweloke ngaphasi komnyango wezerhwebo, zamabubulo nezokuphalisana ngokuthengisa.
tgt_text: he dza vha dzi tshi khou wanala hone, dzo vha dzi khou ḓura vhukuma, ngauralo, muvhuso wa bvisa thenda ya mveledzo ya dziventhiḽeitha," vha ralo vho sanne.

src_text: icsir isebenza nangesiphefumulisi secpap esimahlangothimabili esinqophe ukusiza iingulani ezinazamatshwayo abukhali wecovid19.
tgt_text: thenda yo vha tshipiḓa tsha thandela ya venthiḽeitha ya lushaka ya muvhuso u bva kha muhasho wa mbambadzo, nḓowetshumo na muṱaṱisano.

src_text: lesisiphefumulisi sizakusiza ukuphefumula ngokukhokha ummoya nangokuphefumulela ngaphandle, ngokubeka isiphefumulisi ezingeni lesigandelelo somfutho esijame ndawonye namkha ngokulinganisa umthamo weoksijini efuneka esigulini bese kubekwa umfutho wayo ezingeni elikhambisana nesilinganiswesi.
tgt_text: afrika tshipembe ḽi khou shuma u tandulula thaidzo ya ṱhahelelo ya venthiḽeitha silusapho nyanda venthiḽeitha dzi bveledzwaho fhano hayani dzi ḓo thusa vhalwadze vha re na tsumbadwadze dza covid19 dzine dzi sa vhe khombo nga maanḓa uri vha kone u fema zwo leluwa.

src_text: sizanihle sikhandele ukurhatjheka kwecovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed isitjhaba sekhethu sisahlelwe mrarokazi omkhulu emlandweni wehlelo lokubusa ngentando yenengi.
tgt_text: kha vha thuse u fhelisa u phaḓalala ha covid19 vukuzenzele unnamed lushaka lwashu lwo livhana na tshiwo tshihulu vhukuma kha ḓivhazwakale ya dimokirasi yashu.

src_text: isikhathi esingaphezulu kwamalanga ali120 siphumelele ukuriyadisa ukurhatjheka kwengogwana yecorona engumatjhiyakulilwa ephasini zombelele.
tgt_text: kha maḓuvha a fhiraho 120, ro kona u lengisa u phaḓalala ha tshitzhili tshine tsha khou vhanga mutshinyalo u mona na ḽifhasi.

src_text: kodwanake nje, ukukhuphuka kwezinga lokutheleleka kwabantu ngengogwana le esasikuyeleliswe zizazi zokwelapha ukuthi kuzakufika, mbala sekufikile.
tgt_text: fhedzi zwazwino, u engedzea nga u ṱavhanya ha tshivhalo tsha vha kavhiwaho he ra eletshedzwa nga vhomakone vhashu vha zwa dzilafho uri hu ḓo itea, ho swika.

src_text: angaphezulu kwekota yesigidi amasewula afrika angenwe yingogwana yecorona begodu siyazi nokuthi banengi abanye ebangenileko esingakabukwazi ngabo.
tgt_text: vhathu vha fhiraho kotara ya miḽioni afrika tshipembe vho kavhiwa nga tshitzhili tsha corona, nahone ri a zwi ḓivha uri hu na tshivhalo tshinzhi tsha vho kavhiwaho tshi songo vhonalaho.

src_text: njenganje, qobe lilanga sesibala abantu abangaphezulu kweenkulungwana ezili12 abangenwe yingogwana le.
tgt_text: zwazwino ri khou rekhoda tshivhalo tshiswa tsha vha kavhiwaho tshi fhiraho 12 000 ḓuvha ḽiṅwe na ḽiṅwe.

src_text: solo isifo secovid19 sehla ngenyanga kantaka, ubuncani babo bazii4 079 abantu esele sibabulele.
tgt_text: u bva tshe dwadze ḽa ṱaha nga ṱhafamuhwe, vhathu vha swikaho 4.079 vho lovha nga nṱhani ha covid19.

src_text: njengamakhaza amakhulu embatha ilizwe lekhethu avela elwandlekazi isouth atlantic ngalesisikhathi somnyaka, kuneengcenye ezimbadlwana zelizweli ezizakuhlala zingakacaphazeleki.
tgt_text: u fana na lutsinga luhulu lwa muya u rotholaho vhukuma lu swielaho shangoni ḽashu u bva kha south antlantic nga tshifhinga hetshi tsha ṅwaha, hu na zwipiḓa zwi si gathi zwa shango ḽashu zwine zwa ḓo sala zwi songo kwamiwa nga tshitzhili tsha corona.

src_text: isiwuruwuru sengogwana icorona size ngobukhali obukhulu begodu sinamandla wokubhubhisa ukudlula koke esakhe sakubona phambilini.
tgt_text: ḓumbu ḽa tshitzhili tsha corona ḽo kalula vhukuma na u vha ḽi tshinyadzesaho u fhira zwe ra vhuya ra ṱangana nazwo murahu.

src_text: sikukuruja imithombo yethu yamandla nekghono lethu ukufika ekugcineni.
tgt_text: ḽi khou swiela fhu zwiko zwashu na thandululo dzashu u swika magumoni.

src_text: kufikile kwanje ukukhuphuka kwesibalo sabantu abatheleleka ngengogwana abososayensi bekhethu ababekuphengule eenyangeni ezintathu ezidlulileko.
tgt_text: u gonya nga u ṱavhanya ha tshivhalo tsha vha kavhiwaho he vhomakone vhashu na vhorasaintsi vha hu bula uri hu ḓo itea miṅwedzi miraru yo fhiraho, ho swika.

src_text: kuthome etjingalanga kapa kantike njenganje sekusahlele epumalanga kapa negauteng.
tgt_text: ho thoma kapa vhukovhela nahone hu khou itea ngei kapa vhubvaḓuvha na gauteng.

src_text: kodwanake nanyana isibalo sabantu abatheleleka ngengogwana sikhuphuka ngamandla kangaka nje, kuqakathekile ukuthi sitjheje ukuthi isibalo sabantu ababulawa yingogwana le lapha ekhethu sihlangana neembalo eziphasi khulu ephasini loke, njengoba siyi1.5% nje.
tgt_text: naho zwo ralo, musi tshivhalo tsha vha kavhiwaho tshi tshi khou gonya nga luvhilo, ndi zwa vhuṱhogwa u ḓivha uri reithi yashu ya vha lovhaho ya phesenthe ya 1.5 ndi iṅwe ya dza fhasisa ḽifhasini.

src_text: lesisibaloke silinganiswa nesilinganiso sabantu ababulawa yingogwana yecorona abayi4.4%.
tgt_text: hezwi zwi khou vhambedzwa na tshivhalokati tsha reithi ya vha khou lovhaho tsha ḽifhasi tsha phesenthe dza 4.4. ri tea u livhisa ndivhuwo dzashu dza u vha na tshivhalo tsha mpfu tsha fhasi kha shango ḽashu kha tshenzhemo na vhuḓikumedzeli ha vhashumeli vha mutakalo vhashu na maga e ra a dzhia nga u ṱavhanyedza u bveledzisa na u lugisela sisiṱeme ya mutakalo washu.

src_text: ukuthi sibe nesibalo esiphasi sabantu ababulawa yingogwana elizweni lekhethweli kungenca yelimuko nokuzinikela kwabosokghonofundwa bezamaphilo bekhethu kunye namagadango arhabako esiwathetheko ukwakha amandla wehlelo lethu lezamaphilo.
tgt_text: naho vhunzhi ha vhathu vhashu vho dzhia vhukando ha u thivhela u phaḓalala ha tshitzhili, vha hone vhane vha sa khou ita nga u ralo.

src_text: ngitjho nanyana ubunengi babantu bekhethu bathethe igadango lokukhandela ukurhatjheka kwengogwana le nje, abanye akhange bakwenze lokho.
tgt_text: hu na vhaṅwe vhukati hashu vhane vha khou pfuka milayo ye ya phasiswa ya u lwa na vhulwadze.

src_text: kunabanye bethu abayeqisa amehlo imilayelo nemibandela ephasiselwe ukukhandela isifesi.
tgt_text: vhukati ha tshiwo tsha dwadze iḽi, u ṋamela thekhisi u songo ambara masiki, u kuvhangana na dzikhonani, u ya mbulungoni kana u dalela vha muṱa, na zwone zwi nga phaḓaladza tshitzhili na u lozwa matshilo.

src_text: kilesisifo esirhageleko, ukungena ngeteksini ngaphandle kwemaski, ukubuthana nihlangane nabangani, ukuya emaphathini namkha ngitjho nokuvakatjhela umndeni imbala, nakho kungayirhatjha ingogwana le bekubulale nabantu.
tgt_text: hovhu vhu nga kha ḓi vha vhu vhulwadze vhu vhangwaho nga tshitzhili, fhedzi vhu phaḓaladzwa nga vhuḓifari na mikhwa ya vhathu.

src_text: lesi kungaba sisifo esibangwa yingogwana, kodwana sirhatjhwa yindlela abantu abazipatha ngayo.
tgt_text: nga kha nyito dzashu riṋe vhaṋe – sa vhathu vhone vhaṋe, sa miṱa, sa zwitshavha – ri nga kona nahone ri fanela u shandukisa nḓila ine tshiwo tsha dwadze iḽi ya khou isa shango ḽashu hone.

src_text: ngezenzo zethu – umuntu ngamunye, simndeni, simphakathi – singakghona begodu kufanele sitjhugulule ubujamo bezinto ngalesisifo esisirhagaleleko ekhethwapha.
tgt_text: ri tea u ambara masiki wa labi une wa vala mulomo na ningo tshifhinga tshoṱhe musi ri tshi bva hayani.

src_text: kufuze sifake imaski evala umlomo nepumulo qobe nasiphuma ekhaya.
tgt_text: ri fanela u bvela phanḓa na u ṱamba zwanḓa zwashu tshifhinga tshoṱhe nga maḓi na tshisibe kana nga sanithaiza (tshivhulahatshitzhili).

src_text: kufuze siragele phambili ngokuhlala sihlamba izandla ngamanzi nesibha namkha ngesihlanzekisi.
tgt_text: ri fanela u bvela phanḓa na u kunakisa na u sanithaiza fhethu hoṱhe ha u shumela hone ha nnyi na nnyi.

src_text: kufuze siragele phambili ngokuhlanzekisa ilingaphezulu lezinto ezinjengamakhawunthara nobubeko kizo zoke iindawo ezisetjenziswa linengi labantu.
tgt_text: tsha vhuṱhogwa vhukuma, ri fanela u vha kule na muṅwe muthu – lwa vhukule ha mithara dzi swikaho mbili – u bva kha vhaṅwe vhathu.

src_text: ngaphezu kwakho koke, kufuze siqalangane nabanye abantu – ubuncani bakhona ngamamitha amabili.
tgt_text: zwazwino hu na vhuṱanzi ho bvelelaho ha uri tshitzhili tshi nga hwalwa nga zwipiḓa zwiṱukuṱuku muyani fhethu ho ḓalesaho vhathu, ho valeaho kana hune hu sa tou vha na u mona ha muya zwavhuḓi.

src_text: kunobufakazi obutjha obuvelako obuthi kungenzeka ukuthi ingogwana yecorona le ikhamba nangommoya eendaweni lapho abantu baminyezelene khona, eendaweni ezivalekileko namkha eendaweni lapho ummoya ungangeni khona kuhle.
tgt_text: nga nṱhani ha hezwi, ri fanela u khwinisa nga u ṱavhanya vhupo ha nga ngomu ha fhethu ha nnyi na nnyi hune khonadzeo ya khombo ya u kavhiwa ya vha khulwanesa.

src_text: ngenca yalokhu, kufuze silenze libe ngcono ingaphakathi leendawo zomphakathi lapho ingozi yokuthelelana iphezulu khona khulu.
tgt_text: tsheo yashu ya u ḓivhadza nyiledza u bva mahayani ya lushaka nga vhuphara yo thivhela u gonya huhulu ha vhulwadze nga u ṱavhanya musi tshumelo dza mutakalo dzashu dzo vha dzi sa athu lugiselwa zwavhuḓi, zwe zwa vha zwi tshi ḓo vhanga ndozwo khulwanesa ya matshilo a vhathu.

src_text: isiqunto sethu sokumemezela imilayelo yokuqinteliswa kwamakhambo sakhandela ukutheleleka kwabantu ngobunengi ngengogwana le ukube kanti amaziko wethu wezamaphilo ayengakakulungeli ukuqalana nobujamo obunjalo ngesikhatheso, njengoba lokho kwakuzakwenza ukuthi kubhubhe abantu abanengi khulu.
tgt_text: kha tshifhinga tshe ra vha ri natsho, ro dzhia maga a vhuṱhogwa u khwaṱhisa phindulo ya mutakalo washu.

src_text: ngesikhathi esibe naso, sithethe amagadango aqakathekileko wokuqinisa amandla wehlelo lethu lezamaphilo wokulwa nesifesi.
tgt_text: ro ita dzindingo dza tshitzhili tsha corona dzi fhiraho miḽioni mbili nahone vhashumeli vha mutakalo vha tshitshavha vho ṱola vhathu vha fhiraho 20 miḽioni.

src_text: bangaphezulu kweengidi ezimbili abantu esele sibahlolele ukuthi abakangenwa yingogwana yecorona na, kantike bangaphezulu kwama20 weengidi abantu esele bakhanyiswe basebenzi bomphakathi abaqala ukuthi abantu abanamatshayo wengogwana yecorona na.
tgt_text: ro kona u ri hu vhe na mimbete ya sibadela i ṱoḓaho u swika 28,000 ya vhalwadze vha covid19 na u fhaṱa zwibadela zwa tshifhinga nyana zwi shumaho u mona na shango.

src_text: sithenge imibhede elinganiselwa ema28 000 eembhedlela lapho kuzakulaliswa khona iingulani zecovid19 sabe sakha iimbhedlela zesikhatjhana zesizo elirhabako kilo loke ilizweli.
tgt_text: zwazwino ri na mimbete ya khwarathini ya 37,000 kha zwiimiswa zwa muvhuso na zwa phuraivethe u mona na shango, zwo lugela u ṱanganedza avho vha sa koni u ḓikhethela thungo mahayani avho.

src_text: njeke sesinemibhede engaphezulu kwama37 000 yeengulani ezivalelwe zodwa eembhedlela zangeqadi nezombuso elizweni lokeli, elindele ukukhethela ngeqadi labo abangeze bakghone ukuzikhethela ngeqadi emakhaya.
tgt_text: ro renga na u ḓisa tshomedzo dza u ḓitsireledza dza miḽioni zwibadela, dzikiḽiniki na zwikoloni u mona na shango u tsireledza vhashumi vha ṋetshedzaho tshumelo dza vhuṱhogwa.

src_text: sikhande sabe sadiliva iingidigidi zepahla yokuzivikela (amappe) eembhedlela, ematlinigi neenkolweni kilo loke ilizweli ngehloso yokuvikela abasebenzi bekoro yezamaphilo abamaforosi kilepi.
tgt_text: ro thola nahone ri khou bvela phanḓa na u thola vhaongi vha u engedzedza, madokotela na vhashumi vha zwa mutakalo kha tshiimo tsha shishi.

src_text: siqatjhile, sisaqatjha ukuya phambili, siqatjha abanye abahlengikazi, abanye abodorhodere kunye nabanye abasebenzi besizo lezamaphilo elirhabako.
tgt_text: ri ya phanḓa na u ita mvelaphanḓa kha ndingedzo dzashu dza u lwa na covid 19, fhedzi khaedu yashu khulwanesa i kha ḓi ḓa.

src_text: solo siya phambili ngemizamo yethu yokulwa necovid19, kodwana umsebenzi omkhulu useza.
tgt_text: u mona na mavundu oṱhe, ri khou shuma u engedza tshivhalo tsha mimbete wadini dza vha lwalesaho na kha wadi zwadzo uri i vhe hone u itela vhalwadze vha covid19.

src_text: kizo zoke iimfunda, sisebenzela ukwandisa amawodi ajayelekileko nemibhede eqakathekileko ezakulalisa iingulani zecovid19.
tgt_text: tshikhala wadini tshi khou vulea kha zwibadela zwo vhalaho nga u lengisa ndondolo ya dzilafho ine a si ya shishi, u shandukiswa ha huṅwe fhethu zwibadela ha itwa wadi dza u engedzedza na u fhaṱwa kana u engedzedzwa ha zwibadela zwa tshifhinga nyana.

src_text: umthamo wamawodi uyandiswa eembhedlela ezinengi, ngokuriyadisa itjhejo lokwelapha elingakarhabeki, ukutjhugululwa kweendawo ezithileko zeembhedlela kobanyana zisebenze njengamawodi kunye nokwakhiwa namkha ukukhuliswa kweembhedlela zesikhatjhana zesizo elirhabako.
tgt_text: ri khou shuma u engedza nḓisedzo ya okisidzheni, dziventhiḽeitha na dziṅwe tshomedzo u itela avho vha ṱoḓaho ndondolo ya vhuṱhogwa, hu tshi katela na u nga pambusa ṋetshedzo ya okisidzheni dze dza vha dzi tshi khou ya u shumiselwa zwiṅwe.

src_text: sisebenzela ukwandiswa ukuphakiswa kweoksijini, iimphefumulisi nezinye iinsetjenziswa kilabo abadinge itjhejo khulu, ekubalwa hlangana nakho nokuphambukiswa kweoksijini keminye imisebenzi ebekufuze iyenze, ibuyiselwe ekusizeni ukuphefumulisa abantu abaphathekileko.
tgt_text: ri khou shumisa thekhinoḽodzhi dza didzhithaḽa u khwaṱhisa u topola, u sala murahu vho kwamanaho na muthu o kavhiwa na u vha vhea fhethu ha thungo, na u tikedza avho vho wanwaho uri vha na tshitzhili tsha corona.

src_text: saba ithekhnoloji yokuqinisa umsebenzi wokuthola, ukulandelela kunye nokukhethela ngeqadi abantu abakhe baba seduze nabantu abangenwe yicovid19, kunye nokusekela labo abangenwe yingogwana yecorona.
tgt_text: sa izwi zwino ri tshi khou sendela tsini na maṱhakheni a vhulwadze, ri tea u khwaṱhisedza uri ri tevhedza tsiradwadze na u khwaṱhisa maga ane a vha hone a u ongolosa reithi ya phiriselo.

src_text: njengoba nje silalamela isiqongolo sokutheleleka kwabantu nje, kufuze sitjheje siyelele khulu, siqinise amagadango nemibandela ekhona njenganje ukuphungula ukurhatjheka kwengogwana le.
tgt_text: milayo ya u ambarwa ha mimasiki i ḓo khwaṱhiswa.

src_text: imithetholawulo ngokufakwa kwamamaski izokuqiniswa.
tgt_text: vhatholi, vhaṋe vha mavhengele na vhalanguli, vhareili vha zwiendedzi zwa nnyi na nnyi, na vhalanguli na vhaṋe vha zwifhaṱo zwiṅwe zwa nnyi na nnyi zwazwino vha kombetshedzwa nga mulayo u khwaṱhisedza uri muthu muṅwe na muṅwe a dzhenaho kha zwifhaṱo zwavho kana moḓoro u fanela u vha vho ambara masiki.

src_text: abaqatjhi, abosositolo kunye nabaphathi bemisebenzi, bezokuthutha umphakathi, abaphathi nabanikazi bemakho yomphakathi kwanje sebakatelelwa mthetho ukuqinisekisa ukuthi nanyana ngubani ongena endawenabo kumele afake imaski, ngokunjalo nanyana ngubani ongena endaweni ngomodoro ungena afake imaski.
tgt_text: thekhisi dzi tshimbilaho nyendo pfufhi dzapo zwazwino dzi ḓo tendelwa u engedza tshivhalo u ya kha phesenthe ya 100 ya vhanameli, ngeno thekhisi dza nyendo ndapfu dzi sa ḓo tendelwa u ṋamedza tshivhalo tshi fhiraho phesenthe dza 70 dza vhanameli, zwi tshi bva nga uri phurotokhoḽo ntswa dza u fhungudza khonadzeo dza khombo dzi elanaho na u ambarwa ha masiki, u sanithaiza moḓoro na u vula mafasiṱere dzi khou tevhedzwa.

src_text: amateksi athuthela abakhweli ngemzini esesifundeni sinye kwanje selavunyelwa ukukhuphula umthamo wawo, akhweze azalise, ukube amateksi akhamba ibanga elide hlangana neemfunda akazukuvunyelwa ukudlula ama70% womthamo wokukhweza abantu, ibe koke lokhu kwenziwa kulandelwa imibandela yokuhlonitjhwa kwemilayelo emitjha ephathelene nokufakwa kwamamaski enqophe ukuphungula ubungozi bokutheleleka, neyokuhlanzekisa amateksi kunye neyokuvulwa kwamafesidiri.
tgt_text: zwazwino hu na vhuṱanzi vhu re khagala ha uri u vulwa ha thengiso ya mahalwa zwo vhanga mutsiko u vhonalaho kha zwibadela, hu tshi katelwa yunithi dza zwi tatisaho na icu, nga vhanga ḽa khombo dza mimoḓoro , zwi tatisaho zwi elanaho na dzikhakhathi.

src_text: sekunobufakazi obukhanya kuhle bokuthi ukuvulwa kokuthengiswa kotjwala kuthwese iimbhedlela umthwalo obudisi, kwadisibezeka namaphiko weembhedlela aqalene neenhlekelele nokukhubala kumbi emzimbeni, neendawo zokwelaphela abaphatheke khulu, ngenca yeengozi zeemodere, inturhu nokukhubala kumbi okukhambisana nalokho.
tgt_text: nga u ralo, ro dzhia tsheo ya uri u itela u vhulunga tshivhalo tsha mimbete sibadela, thengiso, u hwala na u iswa ha mahalwa zwi khou imiswa u bva zwino.

src_text: ngenca yalokhuke, siqunte ukuthi sikujamise tsi ukuthengiswa, ukukhutjhwa, ukudilivwa nokusatjalaliswa kotjwala ukusukela khona nje.
tgt_text: sa maga a u engedzedza u itela u fhungudza mutsiko zwibadela, hu ḓo vhewa nyiledzo ya tshifhinga tsha u tshimbila vhukati ha awara ya 9 nga madekwana na awara ya 4 nga matsheloni.

src_text: njengegadango elisingezelelo sokuphungulela iimbhedlela umthwalo, kuzokusebenza umthetho wewatjhi okhandela abantu ukuba ngaphandle kwamakhaya wabo ukusukela ngeiri le9 ebusuku ukuyokufika ngeiri lesi4 ekuseni.
tgt_text: ri khou dzhia maga aya ri tshi tou zwi ḓivha zwavhuḓi uri a kombetshedza nyiledzo dzi sa takalelwi kha matshilo a vhathu.

src_text: sithatha amagadango lawa nje silimuka kuhle ukuthi abantu angeze bakuthokozele nakancani ukuqinteliswa kwezinto ezibathokozisako.
tgt_text: honeha, o tea u ri thusa uri ri kone u bva maṱhakheni a vhulwadze.

src_text: nokhoke kuyafuneka ukuthi kwenziwe lokhu, nasizakuphumelela ukudlula kilesisigaba sesiqongolo sesifo secovid19.
tgt_text: a hu na nḓila ine ri nga tinya ḓumbu ḽa tshitzhili tsha corona.

src_text: akunandlela esingasikhandela ngaso isiwuruwurwesi sengogwana yecorona.
tgt_text: fhedzi ri nga fhungudza tshinyalelo ine tshi nga i bveledza kha matshilo ashu.

src_text: kodwana nokho singawuphungula umonakalo esingawenza epilwenethu.
tgt_text: sa lushaka, ro ṱangana u tikedzana, u khuthadza avho vhane vha khou lwala khathihi na u ṱuṱuwedza u ṱanganedzwa ha vhathu vhane vha vha na tshitzhili.

src_text: njengesitjhaba sibuthanele ukusekelana, ukududuza abagulako nokukhuthaza ukwamukelwa kwabantu abangenwe yingogwana yecorona.
tgt_text: zwazwino, u fhira na mathomoni, ri na vhuḓifhinduleli ha matshilo a vhathu vha re vhukati hashu.

src_text: nje, khulu kunaphambilini, siyithwele emahlombe wethu ipilo yabantu esihlala nabo.
tgt_text: ri ḓo bva kha ḓumbu iḽi ro tsireledzea.

src_text: sizakudlula kilesisiwuruwuru.
tgt_text: ri ḓo vusuludza shango ḽashu ḽa vha na mutakalo na lupfumo.

src_text: sizalibuyisela epilweni ehle nepumelelweni yomnotho ilizwe lekhethu.
tgt_text: kha vha thuse u fhelisa u phaḓalala ha covid19 vukuzenzele unnamed lushaka lwashu lwo livhana na tshiwo tshihulu vhukuma kha ḓivhazwakale ya dimokirasi yashu.

src_text: sigidinga abomma ngokubaqalelela kezomnotho ngokubaqalelela kezomnotho vukuzenzele unnamed ngorhoboyi isewulaafrika igidinga inyanga yabomma.
tgt_text: u pembelela vhafumakadzi nga u vha dzhenisa kha zwa ikonomivha dzhenisa kha zwa ikonomi vukuzenzele unnamed nga ṱhangule afrika tshipembe ḽi pembelela ṅwedzi wa vhafumakadzi.

src_text: ukugidingokhu kusikhumbuzo saqobe mnyaka selanga langomnyaka we1956 mhlana iinkulungwana ezima20 zabomma bamatjhela eunion buildings – baba sifofo sabomma bemihlobo yoke, ababekhuluma amalimi ahlukahlukeneko, bavela eendaweni ngeendawo.
tgt_text: mushumo uyu u sumba tshiga tsha anivesari ya ḓuvha ḽe nga 1956 vhafumakadzi vha 20,000 vha gwalaba vha ya union buildings – gogo ḽa vha tshifumakadzini vha ambaho nyambo dzo fhambanaho, vha bvaho fhethu ho fhambanaho na vha mirafho yoṱhe.

src_text: bebabumbene ngento yinye ebebayifuna, ukuthi kuqedwe imithetho yokuphathwa kweempasa babuyelwe nanga lilungelo labo lokuphila ngokukhululeka.
tgt_text: vho vhumbana kha migwalabo yavho ya u lwela uri hu fheliswe milayo i thivhelaho mbofholowo ya u tshimbila kha vharema na pfanelo dzavho dza u tshila vho vhofholowa.

src_text: ubujamo nesikhundla sabomma/sabantu abasikazi besewula afrika namhlanje kuhluke khulu kilobo abomma nabogogo bethu ababeqalene nabo ngomnyaka we1956.
tgt_text: maimo na vhuimo ha vhafuma kadzi afrika tshipembe ṋamusi zwo fhambana vhukuma na zwe zwa ṱangana na vhomme na vhomakhulu washu nga 1956. ri bva kule u swikela afrika tshipembe ḽi si na khethano nga lukanda, mbeu, ḽa dimokirasi, ḽi bvelelaho nahone ḽo vhofholowaho.

src_text: sikhambe indlela ede khulu sibe siphumelelise isewula afrika engabandlululiumhlobo nobulili, ebusa ngentando yenengi, ephumelelako nekhululekileko.
tgt_text: ho vha na mvelaphanḓa yavhuḓi kha u khwinisa matshilo a vhafumakadzi vha afrika tshipembe kha sia ḽa ikonomi, poḽotiki na kha matshilo a vhathu.

src_text: ibe yihle kwamambala indima yokwenza ipilo yabomma besewula afrika ibe ngcono emnothweni, kezepolitiki kunye nepilweni yangamalanga emphakathini.
tgt_text: kha tshifhinga tshenetshi tshithihi, ri a zwi ḓivha zwauri hu na zwinzhi hafhu zwine ra khou tea u zwi ita.

src_text: ngakelinye ihlangothi, siyazi ukuthi kusese kunengi khulu okusamele kwenziwe.
tgt_text: vhafumakadzi vha kha ḓi ṱangana na zwa khethululo, u vhaiswa na dzikhakhathi, vha hwala mutsiko muhulu wa vhushai.

src_text: abantu abasikazi/abomma basabandlululwa, basakhahlunyezwa, baphiliswa ngenturhu, basathwele nomthwalo wobuchaka omkhulu kinayo yoke.
tgt_text: arali ri tshi khou ṱoḓa u wedza nga ngoho pfulufhedziso dza ndayotewa yashu ri tea u lingedza nga maanḓa u sedzana na zwa u sa dzheniswa kha zwa masheleni na kha zwa ikonomi zwine zwa ita uri vhafumakadzi vha ḓiwane vha songo tsireledzea kha dzikhakhathi na u tambudzwa.

src_text: nasizakuphumelela ukuzuza iinthembiso zomthethosisekelo wethu, kumele silwe nokukhatjhelwa ngaphandle kwabantu abasikazi/kwabomma kezomnotho nakezeemali okwenza abantu abasikazi bacaphazeke khulu ngokukhahlunyezwa nangenturhu.
tgt_text: ro dzhena kha fulo ḽihulwane ḽa vhutumbuli ḽine ḽa ri ṱumanya na ndingedzo dza ḽifhasi dza u swikela ndinganyiso ya mbeu nga 2030. ndinganyiso ya murafho ndi mafhungo a sumbaho tshanduko na ṱhuṱhuwedzo u itela u fhelisa khethululo na dzikhakhathi zwi itelwaho vhafumakadzi na u itela u shela mulenzhe nga nḓila i linganaho kha zwa poḽotiki, matshilisano na zwa ikonomi.

src_text: sijoyine ijima elenza umehluko elisihlanganisa nemizamo yephasi ukuphumelelisa imizamo yokulinganiswa kobulili kungakapheli umnyaka we2030.
tgt_text: sa tshipiḓa tsha fulo iḽi, ro dzhenela kha ‘ṱhanganelano dza ndivho nthihi’ mbili, iṅwe ndi ya pfanelo na vhulamukanyi ha zwa ikonomi ngeno iṅwe i tshi lwisana na khakhathi dzo ḓisendekaho nga mbeu.

src_text: ukulinganiswa kweengaba zeenzukulu mnqopho oncame khulu onqophe ukuletha amatjhuguluko wokuqeda ukubandlululwa kwabantu abasikazi/lwabomma nenturhu abakhahlunyezwa ngayo, babe bakghone ukuba nethuba elilinganako lokuba nelizwi nesandla eendabeni zepolitiki, zomnotho nezokuhlalisana komphakathi.
tgt_text: vhuvhili ha thero idzi ndi dza ndeme kha mafhungo a lushaka lwashu riṋe vhaṋe.

src_text: njengengcenye yejimeli, sijoyine ‘iinhlangano zabakhambisani bamagadango’ ezimbili, yinye yomthethobulungiswa kezomnotho nemalungelweni, yinye yokulwa nenturhu yobulili.
tgt_text: kha miṅwedzi ya fumithihi u bva tshe pulane ya nyito i sedzaho zwa shishi ya u fhelisa khakhathi dzo ḓisendekaho nga mbeu na u vhulawa ha vhathu vha tshifumakadzi ya thoma u shuma ro vha na mvelaphanḓa ya u engedza thikhedzo na ndondolo kha vhaponyi, nahone mvelaphanḓa i khou itwa kha mbuyedzedzo ya zwa mulayo u itela uri vha wane tsireledzo khulwane.

src_text: yomibili lemimmongondaba iqakathekile ehlelweni leminqopho yethu yelizwe.
tgt_text: kha ṅwedzi wa ṱhangule, ri thoma u shumisa pulane ya tshiṱirathedzhi ya lushaka u fhelisa khakhathi dzo ḓisendekaho nga mbeu na zwa u vhulawa ha vhathu vha tshifumakadzini.

src_text: ngemva kweenyanga ezili11 solo kwavulwa ihlelo lamagadango arhabako lokulwa nenturhu yobulili neyokubulawa kwabantu abasikazi/kwabomma, sesilime indima ebonakalako yokunabisa isekelo lokutjheja abongazimbi, kanti kwenziwa nendima ebonakalako ekwenziweni kwamatjhuguluko kezomthetho kobanyana bavikeleke khudlwana abongazimbaba.
tgt_text: tshipiḓa tshihulwane tsha pulane iyi ndi u vhona uri hu vhe na u dzheniswa nga vhunzhi ha vhafumakadzi kha zwa masheleni.

src_text: ngorhoboyi wanonyaka sithoma ukuphumelelisa ihlelo lamaqhinga welizweloke lokulwa nenturhu yobulili nokubulawa kwabantu abasikazi/kwabomma.
tgt_text: izwi zwi khou itwa ngauri hu na vhuṱumani ha tshayandinganyiso kha zwa ikonomi na kha zwa matshilisano.

src_text: okuqakatheke khulu ehlelweneli kuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abasikazi/abomma baqalelelwa khudlwana kezeemali.
tgt_text: tshiimo tsha ikonomi tsha vhafumakadzi afrika tshipembe tshi itisa uri vha vhe vha songo tsireledzea kha u tambudzwa.

src_text: lokhu kungenca yokuthi ukutjhiyana ngendima yomnotho nokutjhiyana ngendima kezokuphilisana komphakathi kuthungelelene.
tgt_text: zwo ralo ri tea u khwaṱhisa thikhedzo kha vhafumakadzi u itela uri vha kone u ima nga vhone vhaṋe kha zwa masheleni.

src_text: ubujamo bezomnotho babantu abasikazi/babomma esewula afrika kubenza bacaphazeke khudlwana.
tgt_text: ro ita tshivhalo tsha vhuḓikumedzeli kha zwa ndinganyiso ya murafho zwine zwa ḓo sedzwa khazwo nga kha pulane ya tshiṱirathedzhi ya lushaka.

src_text: ngalokhoke kufuze bona siqinise besiphakamise isekelo labantu abasikazi/labomma kobanyana bazokukghona ukuzijamela kezeemali.
tgt_text: tsha u thoma, ri khou ya u tshimbidza zwa u dzhenisa vhafumakadzi kha zwa ikonomi nga kha zwirengwa nga muvhuso.

src_text: senze iimbopho ezimbadlwana ngaphasi kokulinganiswa kweengaba zeenzukulu ezizakuphunyeleliswa ngehlelo lamaqhinga welizweloke.
tgt_text: ro vhea tshipikwa tsha u vhona uri phesenthe dza henefha kha 40 dza tshumelo na thundu dzi rengwaho nga zwiimiswa zwa muvhuso zwi waniwe kha mabindu a langwaho nga vhafumakadzi.

src_text: kokuthoma, sizokuraga ihlelo lokuqalelelwa kwabantu abasikazi/kwabomma kezomnotho ngokuthenga/ngokuthola ipahla emphakathini.
tgt_text: tsha vhuvhili, ri khou ya u engedza thikhedzo ya smme dzi langwaho nga vhafumakadzi na kha vhafumakadzi vhane vha shuma kha sekithara zwadzo kana vha sa shumi.

src_text: sizibekele isilinganiso sokuqinisekisa ukuthi ubuncani bakhona ama40% wepahla nezenzelwa ezithengwaziinjamiso zomphakathi zithengwe emabhizinisini wabantu abasikazi/wabomma.
tgt_text: izwi zwi ḓo katela u shumisana na sekithara dza zwa masheleni u itela tswikelo na khonadzeo ya tshumelo dza zwa masheleni kha vhafumakadzi.

src_text: kwesibili, sizokukhuphula isekelo lamabhizinisi amasmme wabantu abasikazi/wabomma nelabantu abasikazi abasebenza ekorweni engakahleleki nofana abangasebenziko.
tgt_text: tsha vhuraru, ri ṱoḓa uri vhafumakadzi vhanzhi vha kone u swikela vhubveledzisi vhu ngaho sa ha mavu.

src_text: kilokhuke kuzakubalwa nokusebenzisana nekoro yezeemali ukwenza ukuthi abantu abasikazi/abomma bakwazi ukuthola izenzelwa zeemali, zibe godu ngabazikghonako ukuzithola/ukuzibhadelela.
tgt_text: ndi zwa ndeme zwauri vhafumakadzi ndi vhavhuelwa vha mbekanyamushumo dza mbuyedzedzo ya mavu dzi no khou bvelela.

src_text: kwesithathu, sifuna ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi bayanda abantu abasikazi/abomma abakghona ukuba nepahla ebuyiselako/enenzuzo efana nenarha nje.
tgt_text: ndi zwa ndeme zwauri kha r75 miḽioni ya ndiliso ya covid19 yo vhetshelwaho zwa vhulimi phesenthe dza 53 dza vhavhuelwa hu ḓo vha vhafumakadzi vha mahayani.

src_text: kuqakathekile ukuthi abantu abasikazi/abomma bazuze ehlelweni lokubuyiselwa kwenarha ekufuze liragwe msinyana.
tgt_text: ri tea u vhona uri zwi tshidzaho vhafumakadzi na vhalimi zwavho zwi ise phanḓa na u wana thikhedzo na musi dwadze ḽo no fhira.

src_text: kuqakathekile ukuthi imali emar75 weengidi yokusiza ngamavawutjha kezokulima nokufuya ama53% wabantu abazakusizwa kuzakuba bomma/babantu abasikazi beendawo zemakhaya.
tgt_text: tsha vhuṋa, ri tea u vhona uri vhafumakadzi vho tsireledzea kha khakhathi dzo ḓisendekaho nga mbeu mushumoni.

src_text: kufuze siqinisekise ukuthi abomma/abantu abasikazi abalimela nabafuyela ukuziphilisa nababalimi nabafuyi abalima nabafuya umthamo omncani bahlale basekelwa ngitjho nanyana sesidlule isifo esingumabhubhisa icovid19 .
tgt_text: kha hezwi, ri ḓo vha ri tshi khou shuma kha lushaka na kha dzingu u itela khwaṱhisedzo ya buthano ḽa ilo ya khakhathi na u vhaiswa mushumoni.

src_text: kwesine, sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abomma/abantu abasikazi bayavikeleka enturhwini yobuliliemsebenzini.
tgt_text: zwo ambiwa uri mbofholowo ai sokou ḓa fhedzi i tou shumelwa.

src_text: malungana nalokhuke, elizweni loke neemfundeni ngeemfunda sizokusebenzela isivumelwano seilo ngenturhu nangokukhahlu nyezwa emsebenzini.
tgt_text: mbofholowo ya vhafumakadzi a i tou vha maipfi o tou ṅwalwaho fhedzi nga nnḓa ha musi i tshi tshimbidzana na vhuḓikumedzeli vhu bvaho kha sekithara dzoṱhe dza lushaka.

src_text: kuyadanisa ukubona ukuthi abantu abanikelwa ikululeko, mvanje sele bemukwa yona.
tgt_text: musi ri tshi khou lugisela u fhaṱa nga huswa ikonomi yashu nga murahu ha dwadze ḽa tshitzhili tsha corona , ro amba uri a ri sokou hu mela he ra vha ri hone musi ṱhaho ya vairasi i sa athu vha hone.

src_text: ukutjhatjhululwa kwabomma/kwabantu abasikazi kugcina ngokuba magama atlolwe ephepheni, ngaphandle kobanyana kukhanjiswe nokuzibophelela kiwo woke amakoro womphakathi.
tgt_text: ri tea u fhaṱa ikonomi yo fhambanaho ya ndeme ine, kha zwoṱhe, ya khwinisa nga maanḓa tshiimo tshi vhonalaho tsha vhafumakadzi.

src_text: njengoba silungiselela ukuvuselela umnotho welizwe lekhethu ngenca yengogwana icorona erhageleko, sithe angeze sibuyele lapho sasikhona ngaphambi kokwehla kwengogwana le.
tgt_text: izwi zwi amba uri vhubindudzi hashu kha themamveledziso a vhu tei u tikedza fhedzi mveledziso ya nḓowetshumo dzapo, zwi tea u ya na kha mabindu a langwaho nga vhafumakadzi.

src_text: kufuze sakhe umnotho ohlukileko, hlangana nokhunye ozabenza bube ngcono khulu ubujamo babomma nabo boke abantu abasikazi.
tgt_text: zwi tea u sikela zwikhala zwa mushu mo vhafumakadzi kha masia oṱhe a vhupulani, ṋetshedzo ya masheleni, vhufhaṱi na u londola themamveledziso.

src_text: lokhu kutjho ukuthi imali esiyenza ngokwakha umthangalasisekelo akukafaneli bona igcine ngokusekela ukuthuthukisa amabubulo wekhethwapha kwaphela, kodwana kumele isekele namabhizinisi wabantu abasikazi/wabomma.
tgt_text: nga kha maga a fanaho, musi ri tshi engedza mbekanyamushumo dzashu dza mishumo ya tshishavha, ri tea u vhona uri vhafumakadzana nga maanḓa ndi vhone vha topolwaho sa vhashelamulenzhe.

src_text: kufuze ithathe amagadango wangabomu wokwakha amathuba womsebenzi kizo zokeiingaba zokuhlela, zokusekela ngeemali, zokwakha nokulonda umthangalasisekelo.
tgt_text: nṱha ha mbuelo, mbekanyamushumo hedzi dzi ḓo vha ṋetshedza zwikha la zwa u swikela vhuṅwe vhukoni na tshenzhemo zwi ṱoḓeaho u itela u dzhena kha ikonomi khulwane.

src_text: ngaleyondlela, njengoba siphakamisa amahlelo wokuvulwa kwemisebenzi emphakathini, kumele siqinisekise nokuthi abantu abasikazi abasese batjha bakhonjwa njengabantu abazakuba nesandla kilokhu.
tgt_text: sa izwi hu vhuḓifhinduleli ha muvhuso u ṋetshedza zwikhala zwa ikonomi vhafumakadzi na u sika mutheo kwao u itela u tshimbidza zwa ndinganyiso ya mbeu, muṅwe na muṅwe kha vhadzulapo u tea u ita mushumo wawe.

src_text: ngaphezu kokubanikela umrholo/ingeniso, amahlelo lawa azabavulela ithuba lokuthola amanye wamakghonofundwa nelimuko elifunekako lokungena endimeni ekulu yomnotho.
tgt_text: mabindu a tea u tikedza vhubindudzi vhu langwaho nga vhafumakadzi musi hu tshi rengwa thundu.

src_text: nanyana kumsebenzi ophezu kwamahlombe karhulumende nje ukuvulela abomma/abantu abasikazi amathuba womnotho nokwakha umtlamo ovumela ukuthuthukiswa kwendima yokulinganiswa kobulili, woke umuntu emphakathini kumele alime yakhe indima.
tgt_text: vha tea u thola vhafumakadzi vhanzhi na u vhea vhafumakadzi vhanzhi kha maimo a vhulanguli.

src_text: amabhizinisi kumele asekele amabhizinisi wabomma/wabantu abasi kazi ekuthengweni/ekutholakaleni kwepahla nezenzelwa.
tgt_text: hezwi zwoṱhe ndi zwa ndeme ho sedzwa zwauri rekhodo dza sekithara dza phuraivethe kha vhaimeli vha mbeu kha masia a vhulanguli dzi salela murahu kha dza sekithara ya nnyi na nnyi.

src_text: kufuze andise abomma/abantu abasikazi abaqatjhwako, abe andise nabomma/nabantu abasikazi abaqatjhelwa eenkhundleni zokuphatha.
tgt_text: hezwi ndi mafhungo ane a ambiwa a tshi dovhololwa kha nyambedzano dze nda vha nadzo na tshivhalo tsha madzangano a mabindu a vhafumakadzi.

src_text: lokhuke kuba yinto eqakatheke khulu nakukhunjulwa ukuthi irekhodi lokujameleka kwabomma/kwabantu abasikazi eenkhundleni zokuphatha litjengisa ukuthi kusalele ngemva ekorweni yangeqadi nakulinganiswa nekoro yembusweni.
tgt_text: hu tshi shumiswa maga a eḓanaho, ri tea u fhelisa zwa u sa lingana ha mbeu musi hu tshi holelwa vhanna na vhafumakadzi, hu dzhielwe nṱha maitele a miholo i eḓanaho kha mishumo i eḓanaho zwine zwa vha kha mulayo wa ndinganyiso ya mushumo.

src_text: indaba leke yindaba esele ngiyikhulume kanengi nangikhulumisana neenhlangano zamabhizinisi wabomma/wabantu abasikazi.
tgt_text: vhafumakadzi vha tea u tsireledzwa kha u vhaiswa na khethululo mishumoni.

src_text: ngokunjalo, kumele siqede ukutjhiyana ngomrholo hlangana kwabantu abaduna nabantu abasikazi, sikhuthaze ikambisolawulo yomrholo olinganako emsebenzini olinganako njengoba kusitjho umthetho wokuqatjha ngokulingana emsebenzini.
tgt_text: zwi kha vhatshimbidzi vha vhuendedzi, vhalauli vha dziyunivesithi, khoro ndanguli ya zwikolo na madzangano a vhurereli u ita nyimele dza uri vhafumakadzi na vhasidzana vha ende, vha gude na u rerela vho tsireledzea.

src_text: abomma/abantu abasikazi godu kufuze nokuthi bavikelwe ekukhahlunyezweni nekubandlululweni emsebenzini.
tgt_text: ri tea u fungelela ra ya phanḓa na ndingedzo dzashu dza u fhelisa vhukunzi vhu itelwaho wa inwe mbeu, khethululo i itelwaho vhafumakadzi ho sedzwa mbeu, na u vhusiwa nga vhanna.

src_text: kuphezu kwamahlombe wabanikazi nabalawuli bezinto zokukhamba, abaphathi bamayunivesithi, iinjamiso ezilawula iinkolo neenhlangano zekolo ukuthi zakhe ubujamo obuzakwenza abomma nabentazana bakhambe, bafunde babe bakhonze ngokuphepha.
tgt_text: ndi maitele haya ane a itisa uri hu vhe na mutsiko u itelwaho vhafumakadzi.

src_text: kumele sitjhotjholozele phambili ngemizamo yokuruthula ibandlululo lobulili nelokuphelisa amandla wamadoda.
tgt_text: zwi kha riṋe – roṱhe vhanna na vhafumakadzi – u khwaṱhisedza uri ndeme, vhuimo na mihumbulo zwa vhafumakadzi a zwiho fhasi ha zwa vhanna.

src_text: ngiwo kanye lommoya okhuthaza ukugandelelwa kwabantu abasikazi/kwabomma.
tgt_text: zwi kha riṋe sa vhabebi na vhomakhulu u fara na u alusa vharwa na vhananyana vhashu nga nḓila i fanaho.

src_text: kukithi – abaduna nabasikazi – ukuvuma ukuqakatheka kwakamma, nokuvuma ukuthi nesikhundla sakhe kunye nemibonwakhe ayisingaphasi keyendoda.
tgt_text: zwi kha riṋe vhanna u hana na u amba zwi khagala ri tshi hanedzana na khakhathi dzo ḓisendekaho nga mbeu hoṱhe hune ra zwi vhona, naho ri tshi nga hanedzana na khonani, vhokhotsi, vharathu kana vhakomana vhashu.

src_text: kukithi njengababelethi nabogogo nabomkhulu ukuthi siphathe besikhulise amadodanethu nabentazana bethu ngokufanako.
tgt_text: kha ri vhe murafho une kha tshifhinga tshashu ra fhelisa zwa u kandeledzwa ha vhafumakadzi kha masia oṱhe.

src_text: kukithi njengamadoda ukucitha inturhu eqothele ubulili nokuyisola nanyana kukuphi lapho siyibona khona, ngitjho nanyana ingenziwa bangani bethu, abobaba nofana abafowethu.
